main event: On October 17, 1962, a witness observed a bright shining object moving across the sky, which later formed a triangle with two additional objects.
interesting points: The main object appeared to jump as it moved, covering approximately 100 yards in 2 minutes., The objects formed a triangle for about 5 minutes before separating., The first object faded from view after about 15 seconds., The witness called his brother-in-law to observe the sighting with him., The observation lasted for a total of 10 minutes.
sighted object: three bright objects in the sky
witness description: Witness was cleaning the gutter on his roof when he noticed the object.
